statements: UPDATE humanitarian_supplies SET quantity = 50 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE humanitarian_supplies SET location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Supplies';
UPDATE humanitarian_supplies SET delivery_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE item_name = 'Medicine';
UPDATE humanitarian_supplies SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE location = 'Central Warehouse';
UPDATE humanitarian_supplies SET delivery_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE supplier_name = 'Global Aid Organization';
UPDATE humanitarian_supplies SET quantity = 0, location = 'Destroyed Area' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE procurement SET quantity = 100 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE inventory SET location = 'Warehouse B' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE procurement SET quantity = quantity - 5, vendor = 'New Vendor' WHERE item_id = 3 AND delivery_date > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE inventory SET location = CONCAT('Warehouse ', id) WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
UPDATE Supplies SET quantity = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Orders SET quantity_ordered = 50 WHERE order_id = 1;
UPDATE Suppliers SET contact_person = 'John Doe' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE Supplies SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Orders SET quantity_ordered = 100, order_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE order_id = 101;
UPDATE Suppliers SET contact_person = 'John Doe', phone_number = '555-123-4567' WHERE supplier_id = 201;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE products SET price = 19.99 WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE suppliers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE name = 'Product A'
UPDATE products SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE id IN (SELECT product_id FROM transactions WHERE quantity > 100)
UPDATE suppliers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE id = (SELECT supplier_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01')
UPDATE supplies SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE supplier SET location = 'New Location' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE procurement SET total_cost = total_cost + 50.50 WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE supplies SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE supplier_id = 1
UPDATE procurement SET total_cost = total_cost * 1.1 WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01'
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = CASE WHEN location = 'Warehouse A' THEN quantity + 5 ELSE quantity - 5 END
